meaningMnemonic: It's so <kanji>elegant</kanji> and so <kanji>comfort</kanji>ing. This is <vocabulary>Japanese court music</vocabulary>, and it's what fancy court people listened to in Japan back in the day. You can also call it <vocabulary>gagaku</vocabulary> if you'd like.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
